This comes as Ronaldo missed recent matches amid reported frustration with club funding, particularly after rival Al-Hilal's signings. Despite his absence, Al-Nassr secured a key victory.

He praised the US team's performance, a country new to cricket, while advocating for zero reciprocal tariffs in a light-hearted exchange with the US Ambassador.

description: Kanpur tobacco tycoon's son, Shivam Mishra, faces an FIR and a cop's shunting after his Lamborghini crashed, injuring three and damaging vehicles. His family claims a seizure caused the incident, while authorities investigate potential reckless driving and other factors. The crash has sparked outrage over elite impunity.

title: 'We didn't keep Tendulkar waiting': Growing calls for Vaibhav Sooryavanshi's early India call-up
description: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi, a 14-year-old prodigy, stunned the cricketing world with a record-breaking 175 in the U19 World Cup final, leading India to victory. His performance has reignited the debate on fast-tracking young talents, with Shashi Tharoor drawing parallels to Sachin Tendulkar. However, ICC regulations prevent Sooryavanshi from playing international cricket until March 2026.

title: Oil strategy guided by national interest: Foreign secretary Vikram Misri
description: India's oil sourcing strategy will prioritize national interest, avoiding dependence on any single country, stated Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri. Petroleum companies make purchasing decisions based on market conditions, availability, pricing, and risk assessment. The government's primary goal is to ensure adequate, reliable, and fairly priced energy for Indian consumers.

title: Delhi pit death: Cops probe if contractors tried ‘covering up lapses’
description: Police are investigating a potential cover-up in the death of Kamal Dhyani, who fell into a pit. Sub-contractor Rajesh Kumar Prajapati and labourer Yogesh have been arrested, with Prajapati allegedly instructing Yogesh to alter the accident scene. Contractors Himanshu Gupta and Kavish are also sought for questioning.

This comes amid challenges with Windows 11 reliability and underwhelming Copilot adoption, raising questions about the company's AI strategy and product quality.

title: 'Jana Nayagan' censor row: Vijay starrer to end legal battle, Madras HC to hear on Feb 10
description: Thalapathy Vijay's 'Jana Nayagan' censor row is nearing an end as the producers have withdrawn their legal battle. The Madras High Court will hear the case for withdrawal on February 10, 2026. This move allows the film's certification process to proceed with the revising committee, potentially paving the way for its delayed release.

title: Are taxes on cigarettes adequate to deter consumers in India?
description: The latest taxes on cigarettes in India make up just 53% of the retail price, far lower than WHO’s 75% benchmark

title: NBA trade rumors: Lakers eye $186m Bucks star to join LeBron & Doncic
description: Trade speculation is intensifying around the Lakers potentially acquiring Giannis Antetokounmpo in the 2026 offseason. A hypothetical framework involves a package of Austin Reaves, Rui Hachimura, Dalton Knecht, Adou Thiero, and multiple future draft picks. This move would create a star-studded trio with LeBron James and Luka Dončić, aiming for immediate championship contention.

title: Travis Kelce felt 'awkward' with Blake Lively & Ryan Reynolds, reports say
description: As Taylor Swift deals with probably being called to court after her controversial text exchange with Blake Lively was made public, it seems Travis Kelce was never fond of their company. Just a few hours ago, an insider has claimed that Travis Kelce reportedly felt uncomfortable while hanging out with the Hollywood power couple and is now pretty concerned about Taylor Swift.
